diamonds.title: Round Brilliant Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Round Brilliant diamonds are the most popular diamond cut, designed to maximize brilliance and fire with 57–58 precision facets. Highly liquid and preferred for engagement and investment jewelry.

diamonds.title: Oval Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Oval diamonds offer excellent brilliance with an elongated shape that appears larger per carat, making them popular for elegant luxury designs.

diamonds.title: Cushion Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Cushion cut diamonds feature rounded corners and large facets that enhance brilliance while preserving a soft vintage appearance.

diamonds.title: Emerald Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Emerald cut diamonds emphasize clarity and symmetry using long step facets, creating a hall-of-mirrors effect valued by collectors.

diamonds.title: Asscher Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Asscher cut diamonds feature deep step facets and square symmetry offering strong brilliance and geometric elegance.

diamonds.title: Princess Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Princess cut diamonds deliver sharp brilliance with modern square geometry, widely used in contemporary engagement rings.

diamonds.title: Pear Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Pear shaped diamonds combine round brilliance and marquise elegance, producing a graceful teardrop silhouette.

diamonds.title: Marquise Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Marquise diamonds maximize surface area, creating larger visual size and dramatic brilliance.

diamonds.title: Radiant Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Radiant diamonds combine brilliant and step cut facets to deliver intense sparkle in rectangular form.

diamonds.title: Fancy Yellow Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Fancy yellow diamonds are valued for strong natural color saturation and luxury appeal.

diamonds.title: Champagne Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Champagne diamonds display warm brown tones and are used in luxury fashion jewelry.

sapphires.title: Cornflower Blue Sapphire (Neelam)
sapphires.longDesc: Cornflower blue sapphires are prized for soft velvety blue tone and exceptional transparency, preferred in luxury and astrology.

sapphires.title: Royal Blue Sapphire (Neelam)
sapphires.longDesc: Royal blue sapphires show deep saturated blue color and strong brilliance for premium jewelry.

sapphires.title: Deep Blue Sapphire (Neelam)
sapphires.longDesc: Deep blue sapphires from Madagascar provide rich tone and excellent clarity.
